trans-unit.source: Represents a flow content element used to group <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref> elements within a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Table"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个流内容元素，用于向组<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref>中的元素<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Table"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a way to arbitrarily group rows within a table; every row in a table must belong to a row grouping.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供对任意行进行分组表; 中的方法表中的每行必须属于的行分组。

trans-unit.source: Rows within a row group often share a common intent, and can be styled as a group.
trans-unit.target: 行组中的行通常共享相同的用途，并且可以作为一个组来设置样式。

trans-unit.source: A common use for row groupings is to separate special-purpose rows, such as a title, header, and footer rows, from the primary content contained by the table.
trans-unit.target: 行分组的一个常见用途是将专用的行，如标题、 页眉和页脚的行，与表中所含主内容分开。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref> class.

Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref> objects that comprise the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection"></xref>包含<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref>对象组成的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection> returned by this property to enumerate or manipulate the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup> element (i.e. add/remove rows).
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection>此属性来枚举或操作的内容返回<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup>元素 （即添加/删除行）。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref> elements that comprise the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection"> </xref>包含<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref>所包含的内容的元素<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有任何默认值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup.Rows*> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup.Rows*>属性应对其进行持久化。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup.Rows%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: 这`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因为<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup.Rows%2A>属性不具有简单的默认值。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法指示属性是否已从其默认值。

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你也正在开发的设计器<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup>或开发你自己控制合并<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup></xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup>通常调用此方法

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果属性值已更改其默认设置;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adds a table row to the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref> collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref> to add to the collection.
Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 将节点的文本内容添加到对象。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
